Name: Color Souls
About the game: Color Souls is a Splatformer where you must paint where you step This game is not for everyone, be prepared to die several times before completing a level. Use various skills like jump... Double jump, slide, wall jump, and splat paint. Prepare for fights against powerful bosses. Features 50 Levels to you challenge 4 Powerful bosses to you beat Utilize parkour skills like jump, double jump, slide, wall jump Paint Everything around you
